name: Makar's Adventure
description:
Makar's adventure is a pixel-art based casual rogue-lite game for mobile devices, with a spin of Indian mythology and culture on regular casual mobile games. Explore 10 different hand-crafted biomes, each with 5 stages filled with biome-specific enemies and one giant boss.

Makar’s adventure puts the player into the shoes of a makar (legendary sea creature) who has to fight his way to find the pieces of a lost powerful jewel. All the pieces are scattered through different biomes and owned by their champions. In his journey, the makar will die multiple times only to come back stronger every time.

Story

A Makar named Dhwaj, was summoned by the gatekeeper of the death. Dhwaj was informed that the jewel he was supposed to be guarding has been stolen. Now Dwaj will have to face the trial and be punished for his carelessness unless he recovers the lost jewel before the trial begins.

The Jewel has been broken down into 10 pieces and these pieces are currently owned by the champions of 10 different regions. In order to recover the jewel, now Dhwaj has to travel across regions fighting foes and defeating champions. But a mystery awaits him. As he defeats the champions, he uncovers a deeper plot behind the theft of the jewel.

Features
  • Story: An interesting story that unveils as the character progresses with a twist in the end.
  • Challenging gameplay: Play adapts and figures out strategies to defeat enemies. Every new enemy and biome comes with its own challenges.
  • Evolve with every playthrough: every time makar dies he collects fruits on the way, which he can use to unlock powers or upgrade them to become stronger.
  • Roguelite on mobiles: Makar’s adventure is a rogue-lite for mobile devices, providing a good enough challenge for those looking for some extra spice in casual gaming.
Note
  • The game is in the prototype stage and showcases only the first biome right now. We are still to add many features like procedural level generation, upgrade system, etc.
  • You are free to play the game without paying anything. If you like the game, please consider dropping a tip. Some doughnuts will really motivate us to complete the game.
